item.title: Adopting DevSecOps for development and testing - What and Why?
item.description: Introduction to DevSecOps DevOps is a buzzword in the IT industry.

item.title: DevOps - What and Why?
item.description: DevOps, literally, is the intersection of development and operations. It is an extremely broad term, used differently by different industries.
